name: ModelDebugOptionsComponent
desc: A component that changes how RealityKit renders its entity to help with debugging.

items.name: init(visualizationMode: ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode)
items.desc: Creates a component that isolates a portion of the rendering process and displays it as the entity’s surface texture.

items.name: var visualizationMode: ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode
items.desc: The part of the rendering process to display as the entity’s surface texture.

items.name: enum ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode
items.desc: A mode that specifies the portion of the rendering process to isolate and display for debugging.

items.name: static func registerComponent()
items.desc: Registers the component type with the entity component system.
